tool.name: OGS: MoveMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'MoveMesh'.
tool.command: for i in $mesh; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; MoveMesh --mesh '$mesh.element_identifier' #if str($x).strip() != 'None' and str($x).strip() != '': --x '$x' #end if #if str($y).strip() != 'None' and str($y).strip() != '': --y '$y' #end if #if str($z).strip() != 'None' and str($z).strip() != '': --z '$z' #end if --output-mesh output_1.vtu
tool.help: This tool runs the **MoveMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
